Instruction: Slice the peaches, fresh mozzarella cheese, and tomatoes into 1/4-inch thick slices.
Arrange the peach, mozzarella, and tomato slices alternately on a serving platter, overlapping slightly.
Tuck fresh basil leaves in between the slices.
Drizzle balsamic glaze and extra virgin olive oil over the arranged salad.
Season the salad with salt and black pepper to taste.
Let the flavors meld for a few minutes before serving.
Serve the peach and basil caprese salad immediately as a colorful and flavorful side dish.
